<h3 id="X11681">X(11681)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: INNER-CONWAY AND 4th EULER</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; ((b^2+b*c+c^2)*a^2-b*c*(b+c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2)/a  :  :
<br>
<b>
X(11681) = 3*R*X(2)-2*(R+2*r)*X(12) = 4*r*X(5)-R*X(8)
</b>
<p>
Let A'B'C' be the Fuhrmann triangle.  Let La be the line through A' parallel to BC, and define Lb and Lc cyclically.  Let A" = Lb&#8745;Lc, B" = Lc&#8745;La, C" = La&#8745;Lb.  Triangle A"B"C" is homothetic to the anticomplementary triangle at X(11681). (Randy Hutson, March 9, 2017)
</p>
<p>
X(11681) lies on these lines:{1,3814}, {2,12}, {3,5080}, {4,100}, {5,8}, {9,7679}, {10,908}, {11,145}, {21,498}, {35,11114}, {40,5057}, {55,5046}, {63,1698}, {65,5123}, {72,6829}, {78,5086}, {92,5142}, {104,6958}, {144,3826}, {149,3913}, {153,6972}, {200,5178}, {321,3597}, {329,442}, {341,3006}, {355,4511}, {377,10590}, {381,5687}, {404,1478}, {429,2899}, {443,9342}, {474,9654}, {495,3616}, {496,3241}, {497,5187}, {515,6943}, {517,6941}, {519,7741}, {535,7280}, {631,5303}, {668,7752}, {764,4462}, {944,6882}, {946,6735}, {952,6971}, {956,1656}, {962,1532}, {997,10827}, {1058,11239}, {1125,10222}, {1210,3873}, {1259,6839}, {1376,2475}, {1385,6963}, {1479,3871}, {1621,2478}, {1737,3868}, {1788,5905}, {1834,3240}, {2550,6871}, {2886,3614}, {3035,4188}, {3057,5087}, {3086,6931}, {3090,3421}, {3091,3434}, {3142,3936}, {3306,5290}, {3419,4420}, {3428,6960}, {3485,5554}, {3545,5082}, {3583,8715}, {3584,5248}, {3621,3813}, {3622,3816}, {3648,5499}, {3679,11280}, {3681,6734}, {3698,3838}, {3704,4671}, {3705,4696}, {3811,10826}, {3817,6736}, {3870,9581}, {3874,6702}, {3877,10039}, {3885,10915}, {3895,9614}, {3916,11231}, {3925,9711}, {3944,4642}, {3947,5249}, {4189,5432}, {4190,5229}, {4231,11391}, {4292,9352}, {4293,6921}, {4853,7988}, {4855,5691}, {4861,5886}, {4996,6924}, {5016,7081}, {5047,10198}, {5084,5284}, {5133,10327}, {5175,8226}, {5218,6872}, {5259,10197}, {5276,9596}, {5277,9650}, {5291,7746}, {5330,8070}, {5440,6845}, {5657,6842}, {5690,6980}, {5717,9347}, {5726,8583}, {5731,6922}, {5744,8728}, {5853,7678}, {6256,6909}, {6260,9961}, {6745,10883}, {6826,10522}, {6827,10786}, {6840,11500}, {6902,10267}, {6905,10526}, {6928,11491}, {6944,10532}, {6973,10531}, {6978,10785}, {8068,10573}, {8126,8382}, {9565,10407}, {9955,10914}, {10529,10589}, {10591,10707}, {10887,11679}</p>
<p>
X(11681) = anticomplement of X(5433)<br>
X(11681) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,3814,4193), (2,388,5253), (2,2551,5260), (2,3436,2975), (4,5552,100), (5,8,11680), (10,908,3869), (10,7951,2476), (12,1329,2), (78,5587,5086), (145,5154,11), (442,3820,9780), (495,4187,3616), (1376,10895,2475), (1698,3822,4197), (2478,3085,1621), (2551,10588,2), (2886,3614,5141), (3035,7354,4188), (3090,3421,10527), (3091,7080,3434), (3617,5141,2886), (3820,10592,442), (3868,7705,1737), (3913,10896,149), (3947,8582,5249), (5187,10528,497), (5730,5790,8), (6882,10942,944)<br></p>
